com.example.joshua.ljc.DataModel.Interfaces

Interface ITestimonial

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Testimonial

    public interface ITestimonial
    Created by Joshua on 01/04/2017. This interface ensures that objects which implement it, contain the necessary methods to perform the actions of a "Client Testimonial".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      This gets a testimonial's author's full name.
      java.lang.String getQuote()
      Gets the quote made by the author.
      java.lang.String getUUID()
      Gets the Fire Base key where the testimonial is stored.
      boolean setName(java.lang.String authorName)
      Sets the client's name which is attached to a testimonial.
      boolean setQuoteString(java.lang.String authorQuote)
      Sets the body of the testimonial, the authors name will remain unchanged.
      boolean setUUID(java.lang.String id)
      Sets the key for where the testimonial will be stored in Fire Base.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        This gets a testimonial's author's full name.
        Returns:
        String value, representing a clients name.

      • setName

        boolean setName(java.lang.String authorName)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the client's name which is attached to a testimonial.
        Parameters:
        authorName - String value representing a clients full name (should be the author of the testimonial).
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value which represents whether the testimonial's author's name was successfully changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if the new author name doesn't meet the minimum requirements e.g. length > 3, etc.

      • getQuote

        java.lang.String getQuote()
        Gets the quote made by the author.
        Returns:
        String value of the actual testimonial.

      • setQuoteString

        boolean setQuoteString(java.lang.String authorQuote)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the body of the testimonial, the authors name will remain unchanged.
        Parameters:
        authorQuote - The String value which represents the actual quote made by a client.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value, representing whether the quote was actually successfully changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if the new quote doesn't exist or doesn't meet a certain length.

      • getUUID

        java.lang.String getUUID()
        Gets the Fire Base key where the testimonial is stored. This is used for updates and removals.
        Returns:
        String value of the Fire Base key.

      • setUUID

        boolean setUUID(java.lang.String id)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the key for where the testimonial will be stored in Fire Base.
        Parameters:
        id - The String value of the new Fire Base directory (Key).
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value, representing whether the Fire Base key was successfully changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if the key is null, which means Fire Base was unable to generate a key.
